labels.label: Download Balance Summary Report Folder structure: /{root}/{company}/balance_summaries.csv

processors.name: Insert New Balance Summary to Database

entry.value: INSERT INTO #{db_table_ea_balance_summaries}( enrollment_number, date, currency, beginning_balance, ending_balance, new_purchases, adjustments, utilized, service_overage, charges_billed_separately, total_overage, total_usage, azure_marketplace_service_charges, billing_frequency ) SELECT ${enrollment_number}, '${crawling_year}${crawling_month}', '${currency}', ${beginning_balance}, ${ending_balance}, ${new_purchases}, ${adjustments}, ${utilized}, ${service_overage}, ${charges_billed_separately}, ${total_overage}, ${total_usage}, ${azure_marketplace_service_charges}, '${billing_frequency}' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM #{db_table_ea_balance_summaries} WHERE enrollment_number = ${enrollment_number} AND date = '${crawling_year}${crawling_month}' );

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

processors.name: ✨ Get Balance Summary Billing ( By Period)

entry.value:
flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None): # Get values from attribute total_usage = flowFile.getAttribute('total_usage') azure_marketplace_service_charges = flowFile.getAttribute("azure_marketplace_service_charges")
# Round number total_usage = round(float(total_usage), 2) azure_marketplace_service_charges = round((float(azure_marketplace_service_charges)), 2)
# Update attributes flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'total_usage', str(total_usage)) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'azure_marketplace_service_charges', str(azure_marketplace_service_charges))
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

SELECT date , beginning_balance AS BeginningBalance , new_purchases AS NewPurchases , adjustments AS Adjustments , utilized AS Utilized , total_usage AS TotalUsage , total_overage AS TotalOverage , azure_marketplace_service_charges AS AzureMarketplaceServiceCharges , ending_balance AS EndingBalance , currency AS Currency FROM #{db_table_ea_balance_summaries} WHERE enrollment_number = ${enrollment_number}

entry.value:
flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None): is_enrollment_valid = True
enrollment_end_date = flowFile.getAttribute('enrollment_end_date') enrollment_end_date = enrollment_end_date[:6]
latest_synced_date = flowFile.getAttribute("latest_synced_date")
if (latest_synced_date >= enrollment_end_date): is_enrollment_valid = False
flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'is_enrollment_valid', str(is_enrollment_valid))
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

processors.name: Check data is exists in database
Get the last day of the month

entry.value:
flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None): init_date = "202001"
crawling_year = 0 crawling_month = 0
# Get enrollment_start_date and then transform them to YYYYMM format enrollment_start_date = flowFile.getAttribute("enrollment_start_date") # Ex: 20211201 enrollment_start_date = enrollment_start_date[:6] # 202112
enrollment_end_date = flowFile.getAttribute("enrollment_end_date") enrollment_end_date = enrollment_end_date[:6]
latest_synced_date = flowFile.getAttribute("latest_synced_date")
# Get current_date with YYYYMM format current_date = flowFile.getAttribute("current_date") # Ex: YYYYMM
if (int(enrollment_end_date) >= int(init_date)): if (latest_synced_date is None): if (int(enrollment_start_date) > int(init_date)): if (int(enrollment_start_date) < int(current_date)): # Get from enrollment_start_date crawling_year = enrollment_start_date[:4] crawling_month = enrollment_start_date[4:] else: crawling_year = init_date[:4] crawling_month = init_date[4:] else: # Increase latest_synced_date by 1 month latest_synced_year = int(latest_synced_date[:4]) latest_synced_month = int(latest_synced_date[4:6]) increased_latest_synced_month = latest_synced_month + 1 if increased_latest_synced_month > 12: increased_latest_synced_month = 1 latest_synced_year = latest_synced_year + 1 increased_latest_synced_date = '{}{:02d}'.format(latest_synced_year, increased_latest_synced_month) if (int(increased_latest_synced_date) < int(current_date)): crawling_year = increased_latest_synced_date[:4] crawling_month = increased_latest_synced_date[4:] else: crawling_year = 0 crawling_month = 0
flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'crawling_year', str(crawling_year)) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'crawling_month', str(crawling_month))
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
